hero.title: Discover the Wonders of Madagascar
hero.subtitle: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the world's fourth-largest island
hero.description: From unique wildlife to pristine beaches, Madagascar offers experiences found nowhere else on Earth. Let us guide you through this extraordinary destination.

about.title: About Madagascar
about.subtitle: The Eighth Continent
about.description: Madagascar is a land of incredible biodiversity and unique culture. With over 90% of its wildlife found nowhere else on Earth, it's truly a naturalist's paradise.

coreValues.title: The ELMADAGASCAR Difference
coreValues.subtitle: We prioritize your experience through three main pillars that define every journey we curate.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Genuine connections with local communities and hidden gems that only locals know.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Rigorous vehicle maintenance and experienced drivers for absolute peace of mind on rough roads.

expertise.title: Local Expertise
expertise.description: Deep knowledge of Malagasy culture, flora, and endemic fauna from guides born on the island.

fleet.title: Our Rugged Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Specially selected and maintained to handle Madagascar's diverse terrains, from smooth paved routes to the most challenging off-road mud tracks.

landCruiser.name: Toyota Land Cruiser 4x4
landCruiser.description: The king of Malagasy roads. Known for its unbreakable chassis and supreme comfort on long bumpy drives. Perfectly suited for groups of 4-5 adventurers.

pajero.name: Mitsubishi Pajero
pajero.description: Agile and comfortable, perfect for the highland routes and visiting National Parks. Offers excellent visibility for photography through large panoramic windows.

cta.title: Ready for your Malagasy journey?
cta.subtitle: Join us for an unforgettable experience with the best guides and vehicles on the island.

tours.title: Choose Your Adventure
tours.subtitle: From the lush rainforests of the east to the dramatic landscapes of the west, each tour offers a unique perspective of Madagascar's incredible diversity.

customItinerary.title: Need Something Different?
customItinerary.description: Can't find the perfect tour? Let our experts design a completely customized Madagascar experience tailored to your interests, budget, and schedule.

noToursFound.title: No tours found
noToursFound.description: Please contact us for custom tour options.

destinations.title: Explore Madagascar
destinations.subtitle: Discover the diverse landscapes and unique ecosystems of the world's fourth-largest island

filters.title: Discover Madagascar's Destinations
filters.subtitle: From pristine rainforests to dramatic landscapes, explore the unique biodiversity and endemic species that make Madagascar the world's eighth continent.

noResults.title: No destinations found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.

cta.title: Ready to Explore Madagascar?
cta.description: Let our local experts create the perfect itinerary combining multiple destinations for your ultimate Madagascar adventure.

andasibe-mantadia.name: Andasibe-Mantadia
andasibe-mantadia.subtitle: Home of the Indri Indri
andasibe-mantadia.description: Experience the haunting calls of Madagascar's largest lemur in this pristine rainforest reserve, just 3 hours from Antananarivo.

nosy-be-archipelago.name: Nosy Be Archipelago
nosy-be-archipelago.subtitle: Crystal clear waters & reefs
nosy-be-archipelago.description: The scented island paradise with pristine beaches, coral reefs, and the famous ylang-ylang plantations.

avenue-baobabs.name: Avenue of the Baobabs
avenue-baobabs.subtitle: Iconic sunset landscapes
avenue-baobabs.description: Madagascar's most photographed location featuring ancient baobab trees creating magical silhouettes at sunset.
highlights: Ancient baobab trees over 800 years old

tsingy-bemaraha.name: Tsingy de Bemaraha
tsingy-bemaraha.subtitle: Stone forest adventure
tsingy-bemaraha.description: Navigate through razor-sharp limestone pinnacles in this UNESCO World Heritage site, home to unique endemic species.

isalo-national-park.name: Isalo National Park
isalo-national-park.subtitle: Madagascar's Grand Canyon
isalo-national-park.description: Dramatic sandstone formations, hidden oases, and natural swimming pools in Madagascar's most spectacular landscape.

anakao-beach.name: Anakao Beach
anakao-beach.subtitle: Pristine southern coast
anakao-beach.description: Untouched white sand beaches with crystal clear waters, perfect for snorkeling and experiencing Vezo fishing culture.

ranomafana-national-park.name: Ranomafana National Park
ranomafana-national-park.subtitle: Hot springs & golden bamboo lemurs
ranomafana-national-park.description: Lush rainforest sanctuary famous for its natural hot springs and the rare golden bamboo lemur discovery.

antananarivo-highlands.name: Antananarivo & Central Highlands
antananarivo-highlands.subtitle: Culture & terraced rice fields
antananarivo-highlands.description: Explore Madagascar's cultural heart with royal palaces, traditional markets, and stunning highland landscapes.

sainte-marie-island.name: Sainte-Marie Island
sainte-marie-island.subtitle: Pirate history & whale watching
sainte-marie-island.description: Tropical island paradise with pirate history, pristine beaches, and spectacular humpback whale watching from July to September.

pangalanes-canal.name: Pangalanes Canal
pangalanes-canal.subtitle: Waterway journey through villages
pangalanes-canal.description: A network of natural and man-made waterways connecting lakes, rivers, and coastal lagoons along Madagascar's east coast.

antsirabe.name: Antsirabe
antsirabe.subtitle: Thermal city & rickshaw capital
antsirabe.description: Madagascar's thermal city known for its volcanic crater lakes, "Pousse-Pousse" rickshaws, and gemstone markets.
highlights: Horseback riding at Ranch du Bonheur

morondava-coast.name: Morondava Coast
morondava-coast.subtitle: Gateway to baobabs & tsingy
morondava-coast.description: Coastal town serving as the gateway to the Avenue of Baobabs and Tsingy de Bemaraha, with beautiful beaches and Vezo culture.

tamatave-toamasina.name: Tamatave (Toamasina)
tamatave-toamasina.subtitle: Major port & spice markets
tamatave-toamasina.description: Madagascar's main seaport with vibrant markets, colonial architecture, and access to the Pangalanes Canal.
highlights: Bazar Be market for spices and vanilla

manambato-lake.name: Manambato & Lake Rasoabe
manambato-lake.subtitle: Lakeside tranquility
manambato-lake.description: Peaceful lakeside village on the shores of Lake Rasoabe, serving as a departure point for Pangalanes Canal journeys.

ankarinny-nofy.name: Ankanin'ny Nofy
ankarinny-nofy.subtitle: The "Nest of Dreams"
ankarinny-nofy.description: Peninsula in the Pangalanes Canal known as the "Nest of Dreams," home to the Palmarium Private Park and rare wildlife.
highlights: Palmarium Private Park with close lemur encounters
Carnivorous Pitcher plants and rare orchids

miandrivazo.name: Miandrivazo
miandrivazo.subtitle: Gateway to Tsiribihina River
miandrivazo.description: Hot, lively town on the banks of the Tsiribihina River, known as a starting point for river expeditions.
highlights: Local cuisine at Princesse de la Tsiribihina

bekopaka-tsingy.name: Bekopaka (Tsingy Base)
bekopaka-tsingy.subtitle: Base for Tsingy exploration
bekopaka-tsingy.description: Small village serving as the base camp for exploring both the Grand and Petit Tsingy de Bemaraha.
highlights: Access to Grand and Petit Tsingy

ambatolampy.name: Ambatolampy
ambatolampy.subtitle: Aluminum craftsmanship
ambatolampy.description: Town famous for its traditional aluminum pot craftsmanship, where artisans forge pots by hand using recycled materials.

ambositra.name: Ambositra
ambositra.subtitle: Woodcraft capital
ambositra.description: Heart of Madagascar's woodcraft industry, home to the Zafimaniry people and their UNESCO-recognized woodcarving traditions.

tulear-toliara.name: Tuléar (Toliara)
tulear-toliara.subtitle: Southern coastal city
tulear-toliara.description: Vibrant coastal city in southern Madagascar, gateway to Anakao beach and the spiny desert region.
highlights: Gateway to Anakao and southern beaches

anja-reserve.name: Anja Community Reserve
anja-reserve.subtitle: Ring-tailed lemur haven
anja-reserve.description: Community-run reserve where ring-tailed lemurs are easily spotted among impressive granite rock formations.

nosy-iranja.name: Nosy Iranja
nosy-iranja.subtitle: Turtle Island & sandbank
nosy-iranja.description: Two small islands connected by a spectacular white sandbank that appears at low tide, known as "Turtle Island".

nosy-tanikely.name: Nosy Tanikely
nosy-tanikely.subtitle: Marine reserve snorkeling
nosy-tanikely.description: Protected marine reserve with exceptional snorkeling opportunities among coral reefs, sea turtles, and tropical fish.

nosy-komba.name: Nosy Komba
nosy-komba.subtitle: Island of Lemurs
nosy-komba.description: Volcanic island known for its black lemurs, traditional woodcarving villages, and relaxed atmosphere.

nosy-sakatia.name: Nosy Sakatia
nosy-sakatia.subtitle: Orchid Island
nosy-sakatia.description: Peaceful island known as the "Orchid Island" for its rich flora, with opportunities to snorkel with giant green sea turtles.
highlights: Snorkeling with giant green sea turtles

mont-passot.name: Mont Passot
mont-passot.subtitle: Sunset over crater lakes
mont-passot.description: Highest point on Nosy Be offering 360-degree panoramic views of the island's volcanic crater lakes and the Mozambique Channel.

hell-ville.name: Hell-Ville (Andoany)
hell-ville.subtitle: Nosy Be main town
hell-ville.description: Main town of Nosy Be, known for its vibrant market selling spices, vanilla, and ylang-ylang essential oils.

toursIntro.title: Tours & Circuits Catalog
toursIntro.description: Discover Madagascar through our expertly designed tours. Each itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs and preferences.

guides.title: Expert Guides
guides.description: Professional English/French speaking guides with deep local knowledge

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Every itinerary can be adapted to your preferences and schedule

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Complete assistance throughout your Madagascar adventure

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your Madagascar adventure? Contact our expert team for personalized assistance.

form.title: Booking Inquiry
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your interests, preferred activities, or any special needs...

info.title: Contact Information
info.certifiedDescription: Official license issued by the Ministry of Tourism Madagascar. Your safety and satisfaction are our priorities.

tourDetail.customizationNote: Please note that the itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs. Want to spend more time at specific locations? Prefer luxury over mid-range lodges? Just let us know and we'll tailor the journey to your exact preferences.

notFound.title: Destination Not Found
notFound.description: The destination you're looking for doesn't exist.

company.title: ELMADAGASCAR
company.description: Your gateway to discovering the wonders of Madagascar. Expert guides, authentic experiences, unforgettable memories.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and updates.

topDestinations.title: Top Destinations
topDestinations.subtitle: Discover the most spectacular places in Madagascar, each offering unique experiences and unforgettable memories.

aboutUs.title: Why Choose Our Agency?
aboutUs.subtitle: Authentic Experiences
aboutUs.quote: We don't just show you Madagascar; we let you live it through the eyes of those who call it home.

guides.title: Expert Local Guides
guides.description: Our certified guides know every hidden trail, lemur habitat, and secret beach on the Big Island.

tailored.title: Tailor-made Journeys
tailored.description: Whether you're a photographer, trekker, or looking for luxury, we craft itineraries to your rhythm.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Tourism
sustainable.description: We are committed to protecting our island's unique flora and fauna through responsible travel practices.

eastMadagascar.title: East Madagascar Tour
eastMadagascar.subtitle: Rainforest & Wildlife Discovery
eastMadagascar.description: Please note that the itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs. A legendary 11-day journey through the verdant rainforests of Andasibe, discovering rare orchid species and spotting the iconic Indri lemurs in their natural habitat.
eastMadagascar.label: Best Seller

southMadagascar.title: South Madagascar Tour
southMadagascar.subtitle: The RN7 Route
southMadagascar.description: Please note that the itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs. A legendary 9-day journey from the bustling capital to the white sands of the Mozambique Channel, crossing the soul of the Red Island.

westMadagascar.title: West Madagascar Tour
westMadagascar.subtitle: Baobab & Tsingy Adventure
westMadagascar.description: Please note that the itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs. A photographer's dream. Witness the Avenue of Baobabs at sunset and hike the surreal limestone labyrinths of Tsingy de Bemaraha.
westMadagascar.label: Adventure

northMadagascar.title: North Madagascar Tour
northMadagascar.subtitle: Rainforest & Island Paradise
northMadagascar.description: Please note that the itinerary can be fully customized according to your needs. Discover the call of the Indri in Andasibe rainforest, then escape to the tropical paradise of Nosy Be with its pristine beaches and marine reserves.
northMadagascar.label: Popular
